name: ListZoomMeetingTemplates
description:
Retrieve Zoom meeting templates for a user.

Fetch the available Zoom meeting templates for a specified user. This requires the user to have at least a Zoom Meetings Basic license. Use the `me` keyword for user-level apps instead of `userId`. Access to this endpoint requires specific Zoom scopes: `meeting:read` or `meeting:read:admin`. Ideal for managing and understanding meeting template configurations.

parameters.name: zoom_user_id
parameters.description: The user ID to retrieve meeting templates. Use 'me' for user-level apps.

value_schema.description: The user ID retrievable from the [List users](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/users) API.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID retrievable from the [List users](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/users) API.

value_schema.description: The user ID retrievable from the [List users](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/users) API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
